mapper.select: SELECT mId, petStart, petOnoff FROM petDetail WHERE petOnoff = 0

SELECT d.mId, d.petStart, d.petOnoff, p.petAct, s.mon, s.tue, s.wed, s.thu, s.fri, s.sat, s.sun FROM petDetail d JOIN petsit p ON d.mId = p.mId JOIN petSchedule s ON p.petNum = s.petNum WHERE d.petOnoff = 1

SELECT m.mId, mNick, petStart, petYN, petYard, petLarge, petFamily, petWalk, petLiving, petChild, petCertif, petAct FROM member m JOIN petDetail d ON m.mId = d.mId JOIN petsit p ON d.mId = p.mId WHERE m.mId = #{mId}

SELECT mId, petStart, petOnoff, null petAct, null mon, null tue, null wed, null thu, null fri, null sat, null sun FROM petDetail WHERE petOnoff = 0 UNION ALL SELECT d.mId, d.petStart, d.petOnoff, p.petAct, s.mon, s.tue, s.wed, s.thu, s.fri, s.sat, s.sun FROM petDetail d JOIN petsit p ON d.mId = p.mId JOIN petSchedule s ON p.petNum = s.petNum WHERE d.petOnoff = 1
